name: chittysync
description: ChittySync Universal Orchestration Hub - Git-like omnidirectional todo synchronization for ChittyOS

scripts.workflows:deploy: cd tools/workflows && wrangler deploy --env sync-orchestrator && wrangler deploy --env health-monitor && wrangler deploy --env deployment-manager && wrangler deploy --env alert-router
scripts.workflows:dev: cd tools/workflows && wrangler dev sync-orchestrator.js --env sync-orchestrator
scripts.cli:install: cd tools/cli && npm install && npm link
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run cli:install && npm run db:migrate
